startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: If you already have URL(s) of page(s) you wish to scrape, you can set them here.

maxItems.title: Search results limit
maxItems.description: How many search results should be processed

extendOutputFunction.title: Extended Output Function
extendOutputFunction.description: Here you can write your custom javascript code to extract custom data from the page.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.
